original_text:
But in Mount Zion there shall be those who escape,
    and it shall be holy,
and the house of Jacob shall possess their own possessions.
korean_text: 오직 시온 산에서 피할 자가 있으리니 그 산이 거룩할 것이요 야곱 족속은 자기 기업을 누릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: there shall be those who escape
and the house of Jacob shall possess their own possessions
